field.name: startVal
field.remark:
is defined according to time mode, if the time mode is 1
start_val:1000000 end_val :7235959
which stands for 12 pm on each Monday to 23:59:59 on each Sunday.

field.name: endVal
field.remark: segment end is defined as time mode, if the time mode is 1, start_val:1000000 end_val :7235959 which represents 0 PM of each Monday to 23:59:59 of each Sunday
